moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6: the Philidor: always a nice piece of work...
moves.5. Nc3 Nf6: already running a tempo behind: e4 is covered...
moves.6... c5: a textbook move: not doing much...
moves.7. Nf3 Be7 8. Bg2 O-O 9. O-O Nc6 10. a3: avoiding Nb4: Nd4, is already taken care of...
moves.12... Bh5 13. g4 Nfxg4 14. hxg4 Bxg4: Black gave a Knight for two pawns: to no avail...
moves.15. Nd5 Bh4 16. Bf4 Nxf3+ 17. Bxf3 Bxf3: not sure, what this is about...
moves.24. Nxf6+ Qxf6: and with this, Black resigned on the spot: after Bxg5, things seemed hopeless...
